mapper.sql: TRQ_ID, SUB_CODE, TARGET_CODE, TEMP_ID, REG_ID, QD_ID, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_tar_reg_que_tb
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from ht_tar_reg_que_tb where TRQ_ID = #{trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and OP_TYPE != 'D'
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_tar_reg_que_tb SET OP_TYPE = 'D' WHERE TRQ_ID = #{trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_tar_reg_que_tb (TRQ_ID, SUB_CODE, TARGET_CODE, TEMP_ID, REG_ID, QD_ID, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_tar_reg_que_tb
TRQ_ID,
SUB_CODE,
TARGET_CODE,
TEMP_ID,
REG_ID,
QD_ID,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,

mapper.update:
update ht_tar_reg_que_tb
TRQ_ID = #{record.trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUB_CODE = #{record.subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMP_ID = #{record.tempId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{record.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_tar_reg_que_tb set TRQ_ID = #{record.trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUB_CODE = #{record.subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP_ID = #{record.tempId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{record.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_tar_reg_que_tb
SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMP_ID = #{tempId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TRQ_ID = #{trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ht_tar_reg_que_tb set SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP_ID = #{tempId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TRQ_ID = #{trqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tar_reg_que.TRQ_ID, tar_reg_que.SUB_CODE, tar_reg_que.TARGET_CODE, tar_reg_que.TEMP_ID, tar_reg_que.REG_ID, tar_reg_que.QD_ID FROM ht_tar_reg_que_tb tar_reg_que LEFT JOIN ht_templet_tb templet ON templet.TEMP_ID=tar_reg_que.TEMP_ID LEFT JOIN ht_tem_reg_tb tem_reg ON tem_reg.REG_ID=tar_reg_que.REG_ID LEFT JOIN ht_query_dim_tb query_dim ON query_dim.QD_ID=tar_reg_que.QD_ID WHERE query_dim.QUERY_DIM_CODE=#{que} AND tar_reg_que.TARGET_CODE=#{tar} AND tar_reg_que.SUB_CODE=#{sub} AND templet.TEMP_CODE=#{temp} AND tar_reg_que.OP_TYPE!='D' AND templet.OP_TYPE!='D' AND tem_reg.OP_TYPE!='D' AND query_dim.OP_TYPE!='D'

SELECT DISTINCT tar_reg_que.QD_ID FROM ht_tar_reg_que_tb tar_reg_que LEFT JOIN ht_templet_tb templet ON templet.TEMP_ID=tar_reg_que.TEMP_ID WHERE tar_reg_que.SUB_CODE=#{sub} AND templet.TEMP_CODE=#{temp} AND templet.OP_TYPE!='D' AND tar_reg_que.OP_TYPE!='D'

SELECT tar_reg_que.TRQ_ID, tar_reg_que.SUB_CODE, tar_reg_que.TARGET_CODE, tar_reg_que.TEMP_ID, tar_reg_que.REG_ID, tar_reg_que.QD_ID FROM ht_tar_reg_que_tb tar_reg_que LEFT JOIN ht_templet_tb templet ON templet.TEMP_ID=tar_reg_que.TEMP_ID LEFT JOIN ht_tem_reg_tb tem_reg ON tem_reg.REG_ID=tar_reg_que.REG_ID LEFT JOIN ht_query_dim_tb query_dim ON query_dim.QD_ID=tar_reg_que.QD_ID WHERE tar_reg_que.REG_ID=#{regId} AND tar_reg_que.TARGET_CODE=#{tar} AND tar_reg_que.SUB_CODE=#{sub} AND templet.TEMP_CODE=#{temp} AND tar_reg_que.OP_TYPE!='D' AND templet.OP_TYPE!='D' AND tem_reg.OP_TYPE!='D' AND query_dim.OP_TYPE!='D'
